meanings.sent1: I accidentally misprogrammed the robot to walk backwards.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to misprogram the security system when setting it up.
meanings.sent3: The misprogrammed vending machine kept giving out the wrong snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind seemed to misprogram her actions, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misprogrammed GPS led us in circles for hours.

meanings.definition: A program that has been programmed incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misprogram caused the computer to crash unexpectedly.
meanings.sent2: It took hours to fix the misprogram in the software.
meanings.sent3: The misprogram in the game made all the characters move in strange ways.
meanings.sent4: The misprogram in the robot's code made it malfunction during the demonstration.
meanings.sent5: The misprogram in the system caused chaos in the entire network.
